verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*, to \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \add where\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H2583"\w*! \w add|strong="H5595"\w* ye \w year|strong="H8141"\w* to \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; let them \w kill|strong="H5362"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2282"\w*.\f + \fr 29.1 \ft Woe…: or, O Ariel, that is, the lion of God\f*\f + \fr 29.1 \ft the city: or, of the city\f*\f + \fr 29.1 \ft kill: Heb. cut off the heads of\f*

Yet I will \w distress|strong="H6693"\w* \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*, and there shall be \w heaviness|strong="H8386"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H0592"\w*: and it shall be unto me as \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*.

And I will \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* against thee round \w about|strong="H1754"\w*, and will lay \w siege|strong="H6696"\w* against thee with a \w mount|strong="H4674"\w*, and I will \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w forts|strong="H4694"\w* against thee.

And thou shalt be brought \w down|strong="H8213"\w*, \add and\add* shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* out of the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and thy \w speech|strong="H0565"\w* shall be \w low|strong="H7817"\w* out of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shall be, as of one that hath a familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w*, out of the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and thy \w speech|strong="H0565"\w* shall \w whisper|strong="H6850"\w* out of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 29.4 \ft whisper: Heb. peep, or, chirp\f*

Moreover the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of thy \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* shall be like \w small|strong="H1851"\w* \w dust|strong="H0080"\w*, and the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of the terrible \w ones|strong="H6184"\w* \add shall be\add* as \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* that passeth \w away|strong="H5674"\w*: yea, it shall be at an \w instant|strong="H6621"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*.

Thou shalt be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* with \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w*, and with \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*, and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w*, with \w storm|strong="H5492"\w* and \w tempest|strong="H5591"\w*, and the \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* of \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \w fight|strong="H6633"\w* against \w Ariel|strong="H0740"\w*, even all that \w fight|strong="H6638"\w* against her and her \w munition|strong="H4685"\w*, and that \w distress|strong="H6693"\w* her, shall be as a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* of a \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*.

It shall even be as when an \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w* \add man\add* \w dreameth|strong="H2492"\w*, and, behold, he \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w*; but he \w awaketh|strong="H6974"\w*, and his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is \w empty|strong="H7386"\w*: or as \w when|strong="H0834"\w* a thirsty \w man|strong="H6771"\w* \w dreameth|strong="H2492"\w*, and, behold, he \w drinketh|strong="H8354"\w*; but he \w awaketh|strong="H6974"\w*, and, behold, \add he is\add* \w faint|strong="H5889"\w*, and his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w appetite|strong="H8264"\w*: so shall the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* be, that \w fight|strong="H6633"\w* against \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

¶ \w Stay|strong="H4102"\w* yourselves, and \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w*; cry ye \w out|strong="H8173"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H8173"\w*: they are \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*, but not with \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; they \w stagger|strong="H5128"\w*, but not with strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*.\f + \fr 29.9 \ft cry ye…: or, take your pleasure, and riot\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath poured \w out|strong="H5258"\w* upon you the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of deep \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w*, and hath \w closed|strong="H6105"\w* your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* and your \w rulers|strong="H7218"\w*, the \w seers|strong="H2374"\w* hath he \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.\f + \fr 29.10 \ft rulers: Heb. heads\f*

And the \w vision|strong="H2380"\w* of all is become unto you as the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* that is \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w*, which \add men\add* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* to one that is \w learned|strong="H3045"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Read|strong="H7121"\w* this, I pray thee: and he \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w*; for it \add is\add* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w*:\f + \fr 29.11 \ft book: or, letter\f*

And the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* is \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* to him that is not \w learned|strong="H3045"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Read|strong="H7121"\w* this, I pray thee: and he \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I am not \w learned|strong="H3045"\w*.

¶ Wherefore the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Forasmuch|strong="H3282"\w* as this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* draw \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \add me\add* with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and with their \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* do \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* me, but have \w removed|strong="H7368"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, and their \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* toward me is \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* by the \w precept|strong="H4687"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*:

Therefore, behold, I will \w proceed|strong="H3254"\w* to do a marvellous \w work|strong="H6381"\w* among this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* a marvellous \w work|strong="H6381"\w* and a \w wonder|strong="H6382"\w*: for the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of their \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, and the \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* of their \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w* \add men\add* shall be \w hid|strong="H5641"\w*.\f + \fr 29.14 \ft proceed: Heb. add\f*

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto them that seek \w deep|strong="H6009"\w* to \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* their \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and their \w works|strong="H4639"\w* are in the \w dark|strong="H4285"\w*, and they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* us? and who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* us?

Surely your turning of things upside \w down|strong="H2017"\w* shall be \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* as the \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*: for shall the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of him that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it, He \w made|strong="H6213"\w* me not? or shall the thing \w framed|strong="H3336"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of him that \w framed|strong="H3335"\w* it, He had no \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*?

\add Is\add* it not yet a \w very|strong="H4213"\w* little \w while|strong="H4592"\w*, and \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* into a fruitful \w field|strong="H3759"\w*, and the fruitful \w field|strong="H3759"\w* shall be \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* as a \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*?

¶ And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* out of \w obscurity|strong="H0652"\w*, and out of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

The \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* also shall \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* \add their\add* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* among \w men|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 29.19 \ft increase: Heb. add\f*

For the terrible \w one|strong="H6184"\w* is brought to \w nought|strong="H0656"\w*, and the \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* is \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*, and all that \w watch|strong="H8245"\w* for \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* are cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*:

That make a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* an \w offender|strong="H2398"\w* for a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and lay a \w snare|strong="H6983"\w* for him that \w reproveth|strong="H3198"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* for a thing of \w nought|strong="H8414"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, concerning the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall not now be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, neither shall his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* now wax \w pale|strong="H2357"\w*.

But when he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* his \w children|strong="H3206"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of mine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of him, they shall \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and shall \w fear|strong="H6206"\w* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

They also that \w erred|strong="H8582"\w* in \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* shall \w come|strong="H3045"\w* to \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, and they that \w murmured|strong="H7279"\w* shall \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w*.\f + \fr 29.24 \ft come…: Heb. know understanding\f*
